rev.desc.rev.desc: Security Role is not hidden Category Model
If a restriction is applied in the ScriptLibrary "ChangeModelRestriction", the restriction is lost when applying a filter to Format "changeModel.qbe"
update panel setup.changeModel.sql, consider empty entry in $G.role
Check if the number has been generated before generating the number
QCRQ1E65843: Task4: Move the RAD applications modified by the PD team from Perforce to SVN

QC Ref. QCRQ1E63674 - Content for Change WorkflowsQC Ref. Add ability to group by up to 4 fields in Change Model list (from 2).Panel: initial.msgChange: Changed the message level from 2 to 1 Panel: get.initial.changeModelsChange: Added group fields 3 in $L.group and 4 in $L.group
QC Ref. QCCR70059 -- Opening new Change does not take into consideration the allowed categories from the profile record.
Change:Changed the query from true to $L.init.cat.sqlPanel: start

Change:Added the following expressions:$L.init.cat.sql="true"$L.cat.rights={}$L.cat.rights=jscall("security.getToken", "Change", "allowedCategory")if ($L.cat.rights~={} and $L.cat.rights~=NULL) then ($L.init.cat.sql="name isin "+str($L.cat.rights);$L.all.cats=false)$L.init.cat.sql=nullsub($L.init.cat.sql, "true")Change 258961QC Ref. N/A
Fix for change.new where check for null was not catching empty array.RAD: change.new

Change:Changed the following expression from:if ($L.cat.rights~={} and $L.cat.rights~=NULL) then ($L.init.cat.sql="name isin "+str($L.cat.rights);$L.all.cats=false)To:if ($L.cat.rights~={} and $L.cat.rights~=NULL and not null($L.cat.rights)) then ($L.init.cat.sql="name isin "+str($L.cat.rights);$L.all.cats=false)Change 258989QC Ref. N/A
Issues opening a Change from an Interaction.RAD: change.new
Change:Added values to the parameters Related Filename and Related IDRAD: change.new
Change:Added the parameters "Related Filename" and "Related Id"RAD: change.new
QC Ref. QCCR1E69958 - Errors when opening change from the catalog or related records in background.
Made the change.new process background safe.
Change:Added the following expressions:$L.has.cat=false$L.bg=nullsub($INTO.BG, false)if (not null($L.change) and not null(category in $L.change)) then ($L.has.cat=true;$L.open.type="category")

descript.descript: Security Role is not hidden Category Model
If a restriction is applied in the ScriptLibrary "ChangeModelRestriction", the restriction is lost when applying a filter to Format "changeModel.qbe"
update panel setup.changeModel.sql, consider empty entry in $G.role
QCRQ1E65843: Task4: Move the RAD applications modified by the PD team from Perforce to SVN

QC Ref. QCRQ1E63674 - Content for Change WorkflowsQC Ref. Add ability to group by up to 4 fields in Change Model list (from 2).Panel: initial.msgChange: Changed the message level from 2 to 1 Panel: get.initial.changeModelsChange: Added group fields 3 in $L.group and 4 in $L.group QC Ref. QCCR70059 -- Opening new Change does not take into consideration the allowed categories from the profile record.
Change:Changed the query from true to $L.init.cat.sqlPanel: start

Change:Added the following expressions:$L.init.cat.sql="true"$L.cat.rights={}$L.cat.rights=jscall("security.getToken", "Change", "allowedCategory")if ($L.cat.rights~={} and $L.cat.rights~=NULL) then ($L.init.cat.sql="name isin "+str($L.cat.rights);$L.all.cats=false)$L.init.cat.sql=nullsub($L.init.cat.sql, "true")Change 258961QC Ref. N/A
Fix for change.new where check for null was not catching empty array.RAD: change.new

Change:Changed the following expression from:if ($L.cat.rights~={} and $L.cat.rights~=NULL) then ($L.init.cat.sql="name isin "+str($L.cat.rights);$L.all.cats=false)To:if ($L.cat.rights~={} and $L.cat.rights~=NULL and not null($L.cat.rights)) then ($L.init.cat.sql="name isin "+str($L.cat.rights);$L.all.cats=false)Change 258989QC Ref. N/A
Issues opening a Change from an Interaction.RAD: change.new
Change:Added values to the parameters Related Filename and Related IDRAD: change.new
Change:Added the parameters "Related Filename" and "Related Id"RAD: change.new

Change:Added the following expressions:$L.related.filename=$INTO.RELATED.FILENAME$L.related.id=$INTO.RELATED.IDQC Ref. QCCR1E69958 - Errors when opening change from the catalog or related records in background.
Made the change.new process background safe.RAD: change.new
Change:Changed the exit from "exit.normal" to "check.bg"RAD: change.new
Change:Added the following expressions:$L.has.cat=false$L.bg=nullsub($INTO.BG, false)if (not null($L.change) and not null(category in $L.change)) then ($L.has.cat=true;$L.open.type="category")
